name: The Story Of A Succubus Named Candice
name_original: The Story Of A Succubus Named Candice
description:
The Story Of A Succubus Named Candice is an RPG Maker Game made by Pikakid98. A member and the owner of the dev team, Pikakid98 Studios (Check us out: [Website] [Youtube] [Facebook] [Twitter])

The Story Of A Succubus Named Candice (Or TSOASNC for short) is the story of a succubus who has lost her memory. Her past, Her life, All gone. Candice must discover who she is. (Subject to change)

Gather allies and defeat the evil demon that haunts Candice.

This game has been in development (On And Off) since the 20th of 2016. Being developed by someone who spends most of their time either doing nothing or making YouTube videos.. And I'm happy that people enjoy my game

[This version is in alpha. Don't worry. There's quite a few levels. I didn't use the lite version of RPGMVXA this time. I bought it]

I will try to get this game up onto Steam and charge a small price

There will be more music added

There will be custom sprites and music

2 alternate campaigns in the main game

Possible non-canon DLC adventures if the game sells well

We have a walkthrough website which will guide you through everything in the current build which will be updated by me as SOON as a new build is released.

Check it out [Here]
